# 𒇯 DU6 < TIˡ 𒇯 = 𒇬 𒆦 LAGAR GUNU

𒇯 in 𒀆 𒁹𒇯𒑖

𒇯 ≠ 𒉠 𒍠 𒍚 𒋺

𒇯 ≈ 𒌗 in 𒇯𒁺 ed₃ 𒌗𒁺 ascend ➙ crescend descend

𒇯 DU₆ #di'u dais TI throne 𒀭 @ 𔖕 𔖔 𔑢 𓊌

𒇯 ≈ 𒆠 #tuli #tīlu tell ≈ 𒌋𒍵 𒌋𒌆 𒌋𒉇 tu.vl 𒌋𒂠 𒌋𒍥 𒇯 ≈ 𒆠 #tuli #tīlu tell ≈ 𒆢 𒆣 𒅇 𒇭

𒇯𒁺 DU6×DU = ED3 = 𒁺𒌗 DU.UD×U³ ed3 𒌗𒁺 Akk. arādu arise advance ⇔ elû elevate
𒇯𒁺 DU6×RE₆ arādu arise (always reverse)

𒂍𒇯𒆷 e2-du6-la "foreclosed estate" Akk. edullû

  1. month 𒌚 𒇯 Tišritum 2. Beginning Shamash - 𒀭𒌓 Zibānītu (Libra) - 𒀯𒄑𒂟 Tishrei תִּשְׁרֵי Tishrīn al-Awwal Sep/Oct

𒇯𒌷𒌅𒁀 DU₆-URU.tu-ba Tīl-Tūba (city of Tulliz) see Battle of Til-Tuba

𔖔 •dais <> 𔖕 𔑢 tu <> 𓊌 таш dash
